DOC.brief_summary: The aim evaluation test : 1 . Whether use nasal pillow high pressure comparable outcome nasal mask 2 . Patient mask type preference high pressure
DOC.brief_title: Nasal Pillows vs. Nasal Masks High CPAP Pressure
DOC.criteria: Patients willing give write informed consent Patients read comprehend English Patients treat OSA > 6 month Patients ≥ 18 year age Patients use nasal mask system fix pressure ≥ 12 cm H2O Patients trial trial mask 14 night Patients naive pillow mask system Patients use inappropriate mask system Patients use Bilevel flow generator Patients pregnant Patients preexist lung disease/ condition would predispose pneumothorax ( example : COPD , lung cancer ; fibrosis lung ; recent ( < 2years ) case pneumonia lung infection ; lung injury )
